title: Software Engineer, Freelance
description: Develop software for a next-generation environmental monitoring device.
accomplishments: Engineered desktop app using Qt C++ for low-level USB communications and JavaScript/HTML for UI that downloads data from and modifies settings for the device
Prototyped a Node.js backend system for data storage and arithmetic operations
Set up a Drupal REST API for user-facing management system for multiple devices that connects to the Node.js backend for data and settings access
Collaboratively developed embedded C firmware for PIC32 hardware, creating device state machine and driver access routines

title: Software Engineer, Cofounder
description: Engineer app to pair restaurant meals with proper wines using Master Sommelier expertise.
accomplishments: Created Node.js API for front-end mobile app to access restaurant, menu, and shopping information
Integrated Foursquare API to access restaurant details and menus
Connected Google Docs to allow finer-detailed menu input
Incorporated the Shopify API to allow purchasing of wine and food directly from the mobile app
Constructed an AWS Beanstalk with Docker images to run the API as well as use Cloudfront for CDN delivery of media assets

title: Director of Technology
description: Create digital sales and marketing tools to empower sales people in the medical device field.
accomplishments: Founded software development division, grew it to over 50% of company revenue in two years
Created and trained resulting team of 2 project managers, 5 developers and 2 QA engineers
Sourced and managed 3 outsourced development firms for additional work as needed
Account manager and technical sales engineer for Fortune 50 and other large customers
International client teams from Australia, India, UK & Ireland, Germany, Italy, Spain
Developed software for iOS that client sales teams use for product demonstration and training
Technologies used include Obj-C, JavaScript, Node.js, Django, Git, AWS infrastructure

title: Managing Partner
description: Provide Macintosh IT services for businesses and homes throughout Tampa Bay, FL.
accomplishments: Founded company, grew from servicing a handful of residential clients to being the outsourced IT for numerous companies in Tampa Bay that ran Macintosh computers
Successfully systematized, automated and normalized infrastructure across most clients to minimize custom support needs and ease remote monitoring
Increased and normalized revenue by initiating managed service contracts with large customers
Created successful marketing campaigns focused on backup, email and server improvements
Sold company to Infinity Business Systems and hired by them for continued support management, Spring 2009 - Spring 2010
